parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attach a target to the simple task.<br>Overrides [[setSimpleTaskDestination]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> task '''setSimpleTaskTarget''' [target, precisePosition]

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> task: [[Task]]

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> target: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p3 </name>=<value> precisePosition: [[Boolean]] - use exact position of the target for map marker / HUD indicator instead of the position known to the owner of the task (depending on the knowledge about the target)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>task setSimpleTaskTarget [targetVehicle, true];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[briefing]], [[createSimpleTask]], [[setSimpleTaskDestination]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
